headline: Pet Safety Hurricane Kit Checklist
description: Make sure you’re prepared for hurricane season by having a plan ready and following this hurricane checklist for pet safety.
articleBody: Hurricane season is a stressful time—especially for people with pets. From mandatory evacuations to deciding whether you want to leave when you’re not in an evacuation zone, things can get pretty hectic all at once. If you’ve never been in a hurricane, or have never experienced one since becoming a pet parent, you might feel a little overwhelmed when it comes to hurricane preparation. Here’s a helpful pet safety hurricane checklist for what to do before the storm, and which pet supplies you’ll need to gather.
